job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As a Medior Front End Developer, you will be pivotal in advancing our learning platform, collaborating closely with our UX researcher, as well as your fellow developers. We're looking for individuals with a thirst for innovation, a hands-on mindset and a desire to create a positive transformative impact on education.

   Sounds nice, but what are you doing here as a Front End Developer?
   Working with a modern stack (Vite + React + SCSS) frontend, Node.JS backend, Fully automated devops)
   Apart from the obvious (iterative improvements, small features and bugfixing) you will be working on large scale projects, new features as well as internal tooling.
   Collaborating closely with our CX team, to create well crafted experiences for our users.
   Using the emerging possibilities of AI to enhance your work and knowledge. Some examples are using generative AI to learn a new skill, or do the brunt of tedious, straightforward work (such as test writing)
   Take an active role in our Agile process
   Elevating the skills and knowledge of your team members
   Active participation in shaping the future of development within Faqta by brainstorming with the CTO and CPO on technical directions and implementations.
job_details.full_text:
Frontend Developer

As a Medior Front End Developer, you will be pivotal in advancing our learning platform, collaborating closely with our UX researcher, as well as your fellow developers. We're looking for individuals with a thirst for innovation, a hands-on mindset and a desire to create a positive transformative impact on education.

   Sounds nice, but what are you doing here as a Front End Developer?
   Working with a modern stack (Vite + React + SCSS) frontend, Node.JS backend, Fully automated devops)
   Apart from the obvious (iterative improvements, small features and bugfixing) you will be working on large scale projects, new features as well as internal tooling.
   Collaborating closely with our CX team, to create well crafted experiences for our users.
   Using the emerging possibilities of AI to enhance your work and knowledge. Some examples are using generative AI to learn a new skill, or do the brunt of tedious, straightforward work (such as test writing)
   Take an active role in our Agile process
   Elevating the skills and knowledge of your team members
   Active participation in shaping the future of development within Faqta by brainstorming with the CTO and CPO on technical directions and implementations.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on traditional frontend development tasks and the use of AI as a productivity enhancement tool rather than core AI development. While AI is mentioned, it's in the context of learning new skills or automating tasks, not building or deploying AI models.

phrases: Working with a modern stack (Vite + React + SCSS) frontend, Node.JS backend
iterative improvements, small features and bugfixing
working on large scale projects, new features as well as internal tooling
create well crafted experiences for our users
job_tasks.justification: These phrases describe core software development activities, including working with specific technologies, implementing features, fixing bugs, and building user-facing applications.

phrases: advancing our learning platform
transformative impact on education
Collaborating closely with our CX team, to create well crafted experiences for our users
Active participation in shaping the future of development within Faqta by brainstorming with the CTO and CPO on technical directions and implementations
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate an understanding of the business domain (education platform), user experience, and strategic technical direction, involving collaboration with business and product stakeholders.

phrases: Fully automated devops
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly mentions DevOps, which is a foundational concept for Operations Engineering, though not specifically MLOps in this context.

phrases: thirst for innovation
Using the emerging possibilities of AI to enhance your work and knowledge
learn a new skill
soft_skills.justification: Phrases like 'thirst for innovation', 'emerging possibilities of AI', and 'learn a new skill' highlight a strong emphasis on continuous learning and adapting to new technologies.

phrases: collaborating closely with our UX researcher, as well as your fellow developers
Collaborating closely with our CX team
Elevating the skills and knowledge of your team members
brainstorming with the CTO and CPO
soft_skills.justification: The job description repeatedly emphasizes collaboration with various teams (UX, developers, CX, CTO, CPO) and knowledge sharing.

phrases: thirst for innovation
hands-on mindset
desire to create a positive transformative impact
Take an active role in our Agile process
Active participation in shaping the future of development
soft_skills.justification: Phrases like 'thirst for innovation', 'hands-on mindset', 'transformative impact', and 'shaping the future' suggest a proactive and ownership-driven approach.

phrases: iterative improvements, small features and bugfixing
working on large scale projects, new features as well as internal tooling
do the brunt of tedious, straightforward work (such as test writing)
soft_skills.justification: The mention of bugfixing, feature development, and automating tedious work points to a pragmatic approach to problem-solving and development.
